metadata.description: They are magical! Their strength lies in feeling and finding those in need.

Employee of the Month is a collection that reflects on the topic of the hard, day to day corporate work. The employees are portrayed by the artist, as plain, green smileys, which is a symbol of how the society formed them to be more or less the same. It highlights (sometimes in a funny way) daily struggles, challenges and disappointments of the everyday office life.

known_contracts.name: Ghetto Doves: The Self Titled Drop - VIP

metadata.description: Cyberclone is a collection of 2000 uniquely generated NFTs stored on the Cronos blockchain. Each NFT Clone is inspired by the futuristic life of the year 2234, where the world is falling apart under the control of the Cyberclones, who are conquering earth!

The Bankroll Bear Society is an NFT project consisting of 5,000 Bears. Found on the Cronos chain. We are offering direct REAL-LIFE utilities. Our Bears are a VIP gateway into the Bankroll Universe and ecosystem.

Looneycorns is the first of 5 unique toys/NFTs from the Lost Toy collection. Each toy character represents a childhood favourite that has been lost over time and needs a new home. 

Each of the 2,200 Looneycorns NFT have a different rarity level and to ensure that each one is totally unique, we have also gone the “extra-mile” and created over 120 traits which would easily make up a collection of 5,000 NFTs!

Welcome to Manor H, where Dr. Boo's ghosts were born. These ghosts come in 2111 appearances, divided into 3 categories: COMMON, RARE & EPIC. In addition to the staking and the numerous perks offered by these categories, each Boo NFT acquired will receive a Poison NFT, with a different color depending on the category (yellow, green or black). A Boo NFT + Poison NFT pair will allow access to the Manor in the metaverse, to retrieve multiple items daily to build a new NFT Boo FRK!

The Northern Hippo Syndicate brings the artistic and creative stylings of Little Sloth from Open Sea to the Cronos chain. This crazy collection of 5000 unique PFP grants you access to so much more than amazing art. Hold a minimum of 3 to receive a plot of metaverse land.
The Flaming Phenix Club is a prestigious collection of 6,666 stunningly beautiful, fiery, and unique creatures apart of the Phenix Finance Ecosystem.

Icy Valkyries is a collection of 1000 NFTs who live in the darkest corner of Valhalla. Owning a Valkyrie allows you to fight in the monthly Icy Squid Game for huge jackpots, build a farm, start a family and establish your own clan.

Carkayous is a fictitious continent created by Jesse Smith (Ink Master | TV Celeb | Tattoo Artist) where his art lives. The goal of Expedition #9 is to further explore Killick Falls Lagoon where the Feral Fish lives. This is a 2,222 PFP collection with FREE Tattoos (flight and hotel included) as the primary utility.

Holding a Lost Toy VIP NFT grants you access to the Lost Toys DAO to be able to vote on the future characters within the collection and the next features of our platform SnipeHub. Other utilities include exclusive raffles, WL to other projects and many more benefits yet to be announced.

drops.title: Deplone
drops.subtitle: Deplone is a young visual artist, who turned his life upside down to chase what he really loves. Since he discovered his passion for 3D art and motion design he has developed his own distinct style. Tries to stay humble and anonymous. Works often influenced by the events from his personal life or day-to-day reflections about the world around him.
drops.description: This 6 piece collection was created with an intention to admire certain elements important to the creative process, but also life in general. The aim of every one of these six artworks is to make the new owner just take a small break and ponder about one of those topics, as well as admire their influence on the surrounding world. I chose the form factor of a surreal museum-like space, because ever since I was a small child, I thought about modern art galleries as the calm, quiet places designed to let the observer admire and reflect upon the odd, non-conventional and often controversial concepts. I hope that events taking place in this little space I designed in my head will succeed in their goal.

drops.title: Lazy Horse
drops.description: The Lazy Horse Race Club connects the metaverse and real thoroughbred horse racing in a fun and unique club. Each Lazy Horse NFT grants access to the metaverse clubhouse and Lazy Horse Racing Game (drops end of January!), it also connects you to our real racing team. The Club owns, maintains and races horses with profits being shared by the community. All of the club's efforts are most importantly focused on providing a long and sustainable post-racing life for all horses. A large portion of all project proceeds will directly fund equine rescue and retirement, ensuring great lives for these beautiful animals.

drops.title: CROugars
drops.subtitle: A limited collection of 2,222 NFTs with a variety of hand-drawn attributes. Deployed on the Cronos Chain.
drops.description: CROugars is a limited collection of 2,222 NFTs with a variety of hand-drawn attributes. Deployed on the Cronos Chain. This project has a strong focus on real NFT utilities, some of which, Cronos has not yet seen. This includes NFT staking that shares royalties with holders, as well as DAO governance that allows CROugar holders to vote on proposals.

drops.title: Cronos goats
drops.description: OG Goats is a limited collection of 1000 NFT's on the Cronos Network. Our Goats main focus is Utility for the community. We will be implementing a buy back feature where half of all the royalties go towards buying the lowest ranked Goats so we can take them off the market for a minimum of 8 years. Our OG Goats will act as a major discount ticket to our second collection of Bad Billy Goats. We will also Gift our community with physical art pieces of their NFT's! The future for these goats are endless as we plan to implement a DEX, NFT staking, P2E games, and Cronos's First NFT art Gallery.

drops.title: Space Crystal Unicorns
drops.subtitle: They are magical! Their strength lies in feeling and finding those in need. All funds raised will be used to support hippotherapy classes for children with disabilities.
drops.description:
Hello everyone, 

I have always had a passion for art which most already know, but what most don’t know is that I am very fond of equestrian sports. Growing up I self-taught to become an equestrian rider. I have also judged equestrian events and competitions and organized charity festivals in support of children with disabilities. 

Riding horses can be very healing for children and their psycho-emotional state and for those who become more involved, assists with muscle development. I used to coach children for free but have retired from this. However, I keep in close contact with the equestrian club in my hometown and occasionally still assist by running the group classes for children. I also financially support and support them with media coverage, assisting with fund raising to help kids receive this amazing and free therapy with horses.

To support the equestrian club and children, I am auctioning a limited-edition 1:1 ‘Rare Heart Hodler’ NFT. It also comes with a T-shirt and an autographed card from myself. Additionally, 10 holders of the 'Heart Hodler' from the open edition will be randomly selected to receive a physical autographed card from myself

drops.title: The Lazy Horse Member NFT (PONY)
drops.description: It's Ponies!

drops.title: Crognomes
drops.subtitle: 2000 secretive hard working Crognomes living on the cronos blockchain who might share the location of the secret mines if taken care of well enough.
drops.description:
"Have you ever wondered where all those shiny crypto cards actually come from?

Those glistening ruby, shiny indigo & luminescent jade crystals that are needed for those ooooh so sweet cashbacks are harvested deep inside the hidden cryptomines. The location of these mines are a well-kept secret by the Crognomes... 

While they’re no tattletales, the Crognomes might share the secret location of these Cryptomines with you, if you provide them safe refuge in your cryptowallet. 

Crognomes have been known to sneak in their wives, the Crognomides, when they’re feeling lonely. So you can expect these Crognomides to show up in your wallet as well!* If you leave them alone for a long enough time, you will find your family of 2 has grown ever larger. 

Start your own Crognome-family and adopt your Crognome today!

*In order to make sure that the Crognomides find their husband in your cryptowallet in time, you will need to have minted your Crognomes NFTs BEFORE 9PM UTC on the 26th of January! All Crognome NFTs minted after that will have the option to safely usher their Crognomides into their cryptowallet by minting a safe route. 
This route can be minted for 50 CRO"

drops.title: Aunah
drops.subtitle: SUBTITLE NEEDED
drops.description:
There’s no slowing down anytime soon.

Between his skillfully bold contemplative rendering of abstraction and realism, his paintings are visceral yet sensual.

Each concept is a treat, your mind skips between pops of color to moody-sophistication. Chance creates and energy with hints of density giving off a slight sculptural feel for the eye to play with.

His subjects are elevated to a new age and vibe that will constantly stimulate your mind with ever-changing narratives.

Chance Watt

drops.title: CronoGods
drops.subtitle: Become A God, CronoGods. 1520 CronoGods over 120 traits. Be Apart of the Journey.
drops.description:
Become A God, CronoGods. 1520 CronoGods over 120 traits. Be Apart of the Journey.

Chance To win a trip the the U.S. Virgin Islands an meet Yako Founder of CronoGods.

Holders Get Random Loot Airdrop.

Holders have a chance to win a share of $10,000 in CRO.

15% goes toward charities in the Virgin Islands.

Have a say on your CronoGod NFT in our unique comic strip that will be mintable along huge names in cronos space. One of a kind.

We offer many more things visit https://www.cronogods.com/
erc20Abi: function allowance(address owner, address spender) external view returns (uint256)

drops.title: Marie's Cyborgs
drops.subtitle:
Marie's Cyborgs connects fashion and the Metaverse. We invite you to enter Marie's universe by sharing her passions: Fashion, movies and her cyborgs!
The whole team is looking forward to meeting you!
drops.description:
Marie is a French high-potential model.
Convinced that art takes multiple forms, she now wishes to introduce her universe through her collection of NFTs and becoming one of the first model in Metaverse.
The collection will come in 3 classes based on Marie’s passions: fashion, movies (rare) and her cyborgs (legendary).

drops.title: MAG Brew Vikings
drops.subtitle: MAG is a project involving illustrative art, beer-crafting, and tales inspired by Norse mythology. All accompanied by friendship and conviviality.
drops.description:
Each Viking is composed of a random selection from 140+ features, hand-drawn by Luigi Zitelli, aka Gigi, a professional illustrator. 
Among the 8000 algorithmically generated collectibles, you can also find the ""gods of Midgard"", six special characters related to the lore conceived by our MAG writers.

Holding NFTs with certain features (i.e., compatible backgrounds) will open the collectors a door to exclusive airdrops consisting of unique Gigi masterpieces.
After the sold-out, our fellow artist will join the MAG Bard and Minstrel to deliver an illustrated book to all MAG holders: the MAGverse will live forever on the Cronos blockchain!

The completion of our roadmap won't represent a final step but a chance to explore new horizons together. 

A ""Beer-elated"" NFT, how does that sound?

drops.title: The LAB: Crazy Scientists
drops.subtitle:
5555 Crazy Scientists has for a long time been in the underground laboratory, they are now ready to move to the cronos blockchain.

Crazy Scientists is a NFT collection packed with utility. The Crazy Scientists will be the central part of the Laboratory’s ecosystem. They will have utility in our future launchpad, farms and play to earn game. We will also provide community utility such as airdrops, merch and raffles.
drops.description:
5555 Crazy Scientists has for a long time been in the underground laboratory, they are now ready to move to the cronos blockchain.

Crazy Scientists is a NFT collection packed with utility. The Crazy Scientists will be the central part of the Laboratory’s ecosystem. They will have utility in our future launchpad, farms and play to earn game. We will also provide community utility such as airdrops, merch and raffles.

drops.title: BobaNFTea
drops.subtitle: A collection of 3300 NFTeas hand-drawn and deployed on the Cronos chain!
drops.description: The Boba NFTea collection is a community driven project being deployed on the Cronos chain. Holders of the NFTs will gain access to exclusive utilities such as governance and the ability to earn $BOBA tokens, that offers benefits like staking.

drops.title: RecklessRobots
drops.subtitle: Reckless Robots is a collection of 2100 unique and detailed hand-drawn NFTs deployed on the Cronos chain.
drops.description: Reckless Robots is a collection of 2100 unique and detailed hand-drawn NFTs deployed on the Cronos chain. Distinctive for this project are the detailed and unique arts, accelerated NFT staking and NFT eliminations (burns). With these eliminations Reckless Robots reduces the total supply by buying the weakest bids from secondary markets and burning the bought NFTs. The burning reduces the total supply and thus reduces the total amount of possible NFTs staked enlarging the percentage of the pool that one NFT holds.

drops.title: The HD: Hyped Dogs
drops.subtitle: Hyped Dogs GEN1 is a collection of 3000 uniquely generated NFTs stored on the Cronos Chain. Each Hyped Dog NFT is generated with over 120 + attributes with different rarities.
drops.description: Hyped Dogs is a collection of 3000 uniquely generated NFTs stored on the Cronos Chain. Each Hyped Dog NFT is generated with over 120 + attributes with different rarities. Being a Hyped Dog member goes beyond owning an awesome dog art, it’s your pass to a exclusive brotherhood with many benefits. Hyped Dogs is here with the goal to merge physical world and crypto world. We are here and we are HYPED! Come join us!

drops.title: Creatures
drops.subtitle: A COLLECTION OF CREATURES THAT UNLOCK AN IMMERSIVE MUSIC & METAVERSE EXPERIENCE
drops.description: Creatures by Cult Leader is a 9,999 generative PFP project that unlocks an immersive music & metaverse experience. Before the initial drop, the teams focus has been building community, creating strategic partnerships, and developing the metaverse to deliver high value and a successful start for the creature community.

drops.title: Cronos ALIENFT
drops.subtitle: A limited collection of 2500 NFTs with a variety of hand-drawn attributes with a unique design sure to please all life forms. Offering forms of utility like royalty sharing that will reward the user upon staking their NFTS on Crodex
drops.description: From far off unquantifiable depths of our universe these brilliant extraterrestrial life forms live in harmony… until recently they have caught solar wind of what the humans of earth have been doing with these “NFTs” so they want in… will you take the small step for man and create the big change for mankind! Our unique utility of NFT staking will allow users to earn a from of passive rewards in this case CRO from staking their NFTs, the rewards are gathered from 100% of all secondary market sales at an 8% royalty fee.

drops.title: Meta Cyborgs
drops.description: The Meta Cyborgs A collection of 10 000 uniquely generated NFTs to boost the yields of your farms on CyborgSwap Dex. The first collection resulting from the acquisition of ChronoSwap by Marie's Cyborgs NFTs.The Meta Cyborgs A collection of 10,000 uniquely generated NFTs to boost the APR yields of your farms on CyborgSwap Dex. This collection will unlock several features over time and will also be stakable after mint starts to earn CNFT. It's the Founding Member collection of CyborgSwap and will be used in all our next NFT features and development.

drops.title: Founding VIP Member
drops.subtitle: Early access to features and reduced fees forever.
drops.description:
Holders of the VIP Founding Member NFT will have access to the NFT launchpad, beta features, and receive the benefit of reduced service fees.

Holders will also share 50% of all service fees as well as other exclusive perks.

The VIP Founding Member NFT has an on-chain referral system. Refer a friend and receive 5% of the NFT cost and they receive 5% off. VIP Founding Member NFTs will be limited to 1,000.
abi: function mint(uint256 _id, uint256 _amount, bytes _data) public payable

drops.title: Cronos Gorilla Business
drops.subtitle: Cronos Gorilla Business is a collection of 6100 uniquely generated NFTs stored on the Cronos Chain. Each CGB NFT is based on 10 + attributes with different rarities. The collection is composed of 4 different factions: MAFIA / AQUA / IGNIS / TERRA. So make the right choice.
drops.description:
"Cronos Gorilla Business is a collection of 6100 uniquely generated NFTs stored on the Cronos Chain. Each CGB NFT is based on 10 + attributes with different rarities. The collection is composed of 4 different factions: MAFIA / AQUA / IGNIS / TERRA. So make the right choice.
These NFTs can then be staked on our site within the next few weeks to earn $CPB tokens and several other features that will be announced."
drops.disclaimer: Presale is limited to whitelisted addresses only. Please check the Cronos Primate Business discord for more information.

drops.title: Lolita Friends
drops.subtitle: Lolita & Friends is the first-ever petfluencer NFT collection. This project is launched by @LolitatheAlien, a Chihuahua petfluencers with a community of 200k people on Instagram. The collection consists of 2,500 randomly assembled Lolitas with over 120 traits!
drops.description: Lolita & Friends mission is to rescue endangered and abandoned animals. Our first mission is to rescue 1000 dogs from the streets: feeding, vaccinating, sterilizing and all other cares to prepare them for adoption. In this collection, Lolita has a variety of outfits, accessories, faces and background colors. Some NFTs are rare, some are very rare, and some are exceptional! Our goal is to onboard worldwide influencer pets of Instagram through beautiful NFT collections with utility. Be part of the original collection and join our mission to save thousands of abandoned animals!

drops.title: Gold Partner
drops.subtitle: Gold Partner Collection - The Hall of Fame is a collection of 300 Hand-drawn, 3D, and animated NFT's with very unique features and utilities. Every NFT is hand-drawn, comes with a unique edition# engraved, a first of its kind on Cronos Chain. Holders of the NFT's will enjoy 30% share of the profits earned from upcoming collections. These NFT's offer a profit-sharing partnership opportunity to the buyers and holders to earn passive income from all upcoming drops.
drops.description:
Gold Partner Collection - The Hall of Fame is designed after deep research by our team. This collection honors founders and inventors of different sports forgotten by the world. This collection is structured in a way that makes you a direct profit-sharing partner in the project.
 Long term goal of this project is to create a decentralized marketplace for trading real-world sports collectibles. 
Unique Utilities: 
	 •30% of profits from upcoming drops are shared directly among the holders of this collection.  
	 •Chance to be a Platinum partner and enjoy a bigger chunk of profits.   
	 •Community-driven Project with a long-term vision of becoming a marketplace for real-world sports collectibles.     
Come explore the joy of owning an NFT project and become a founding member!

drops.title: Cronos Fighters
drops.subtitle:
We fall. We break. We fail. BUT THEN. We rise. We heal. We Overcome. We all have a fighter in us - Mint yours today. 
Fighters are FINALLY Here!
drops.description: Cronos Fighters is a generative collection of 1000 Female and Male Champions. A fighter's purpose is to inspire and motivate, no matter the situation. This is the first piece of the Fighters game and metaverse. Each V1 fighter will give it’s owner many perks, such as, token airdrops, game upgrades, voting rights and more! Our goal is to add value to our holders while creating the greatest world the Cronos chain has ever seen! Fighters Are Here!

drops.title: Big Bad Wolves
drops.subtitle:
Big Bad Wolves is a community based NFT project including real time video game, metaverse integration and big marketing campaign.
Holding the NFT gives you a PRIVILEGED position.
Welcome to THE PACK!
drops.description:
BIG BAD WOLVES is a community NFT collection heading towards a gory multiplayer video game and metaverse integration. Join the ride and access staking, giveaways, airdrops, and rewarded Art & Memes contests!

Holder WILL be rewarded.

1/1 are unique and exclusive artworks made by several artists.

All NFTs in the collection have random stats for strength, agility, stamina, speed and ferocity. These stats will change the way to play the video game.

drops.title: NoBuddies NFT Gen 2
drops.subtitle: NoBuddies NFT Gen 2 is a collection of 2250 uniquely generated NFTs on the Cronos Chain with over 100 attributes.
drops.description: NoBuddies is all about community growth, and passive income. We will invest a percentage from mint sales into investments that our team is confident will be beneficial to our holders. After buying your NoBuddie, just sit back and collect your rewards on a regular basis. The more NoBuddies you own, the more rewards you will receive. So what are you waiting for? Come join our community and find out for yourself why you should be a NoBuddie!

drops.title: MarbleVerse
drops.subtitle: Find your favorite marble and try to become the rolling champion of the MarbleVerse
drops.description:
MarbleVerse will be the 1st P2E NFT game on Cronos Network and welcomes all into an evolving universe where your marbles race to prove their worth and become more valuable racers. Mint your marbles and let it race for you; as it wins races, you will earn too.

Anyone holding Marble NFTs will be able to join marble races and earn valuable rewards based on their marbles success.

MarbleVerse brings a game where you can enjoy racing, winning, earning and owning beautiful pieces of art with the rest of the community.
drops.priceDescription: Mint prices increases by 10 CRO for every 2000 nfts minted

drops.title: LHRC Skybox
drops.subtitle: Full access and control of a private skybox room in the Lazy Horse Metaverse
drops.description: The LHRC Skybox is a property asset inside the Lazy Horse Metaverse represented by the LHRC Skybox NFT.  The LHRC Skybox gives each owner full access and control of their own room, 20 sellable seats to every Signature Concert Event, a virtual meeting/conference room for private events, a view of ongoing races in the Lazy Horse Race Game, customizable and licensable wall pictures, and 24/7 access to all the entertainment the Lazy Horse Metaverse has to offer.
drops.priceDescription: Whitelist-only presale for the first 12 hours (limit 1 per address). Public sale after presale ends (limit 3 per transaction).

drops.title: CronosVerse
drops.subtitle: Buy your digital land plot, develop your property & enter The CronosVerse!
drops.description:
The CronosVerse aims to be the first metaverse social MMO on the Cronos Chain.

Land owners will be able to build structures on their land for their NFT characters, friends, and community members to enjoy. Build using preloaded building materials with absolutely no coding required.

Types of Lands:

Plains Tiles- Allows for building of rustic style structures (max amalgamation of 16 tiles)

Suburban Tiles- Allows for suburban style structures (max amalgamation of 4 tiles)

Commercial Tiles- Allows for retail, office, entertainment and other commercial structures (max amalgamation of 4 tiles)

drops.title: 3DSlothty
drops.subtitle: Slothy Burn Mint
drops.description: Mint 3dSlothty to burn later

drops.title: Cro Succubus
drops.subtitle: A succubus is 2666 NFT collection, a demon in female form that will forever live on Cronos Smartchain. We are just starting to unleash Hell on cronos. "Keep your mind awake, because your soul I might take."
drops.description:
A succubus is 2666 NFT collection, a demon in female form that will forever live on Cronos Smartchain. We are just starting to unleash Hell on cronos. Come join us on this delicious dream and vision for the NFT world. 
Enjoy all membership perks of Hyped NFT Club, future staking utility and more!
"Keep your mind awake, because your soul I might take."

drops.title: Crobees
drops.subtitle: Jump into the hive and discover the beautiful universe around the bees. With more than 110 attributes, all these unique NFTs was drawn with love and high design quality!
drops.description:
The Crobees - A 2222 NFTs collection of bees with more than 110 attributes. The crobees is putting forward a project where the community is in the heart of it. With the mindset to build a hive in the cronos chain, to gather people from all background (DeFi, NFTs...) into a huge family. 

Holding a NFT gives you some premium access as the DAO/Staking/Queen's Lottery/BeeShop. The DAO gives you the power to choose the futur of the project, to take part in the decisions by vote (already live in Discord).

The staking of your Crobees NFTs generates our own token, which opens the doors of the BeeShop.With this token, you can buy WL/Airdrops/Merchandise/Charity Vouchers/Queen's Lottery Tickets/... .Visit our website or medium to check the entire Roadmap.

Join the Hive right now and let's build it!

drops.title: Kardia
drops.subtitle: Kardia is a unique multi-tier gaming NFT project on the KCC and CRO blockchain, starting with the founder's deck of 50,000 playable cards. Using our play-to-earn mechanics, you can play against other players, earn valuable resources, win NFTs, and compete for crypto-related prizes. A crypto-currency prize pool will be generated from secondary sale royalties and will be used to buy NFTs, other cryptocurrencies, and other prizes that can be won as a result of tournaments, special triggers, loot boxes, and more!
drops.description: The Founder's Deck (CRO) consists of 6010 playing cards, each of them uniquely serialized. Each card grants the owner a certain number of Golden Acorns (in-game currency) based on the rarity of the card. These Golden Acorns can be used for various means on PlayKardia, including opening Loot Boxes for cryptocurrency prizes, additional NFTs, and more!

drops.title: Monkey Of Anarkey
drops.subtitle:
The MoA universe will give you access to a unique collection of 1999 NFTs monkeys, darker and more badass than ever. 
Each NFT is unique and composed of different attributes that make it belong to one of the 4 sections, each with its own perks. 
 So don't waste any more time, come and join us if you want to be part of the MoA fam!
drops.description:
"We accepted to be separated from our families and to be put in cages, to be treated as less than nothing.... Then everything changed on May 28, 2016 and the world will now never be the same." 
Monkey Of Anarkey is a gang of biker monkeys determined to get revenge after centuries of abuse. The MoA universe will give you access to a unique collection of 1999 NFTs monkeys, darker and more badass than ever. 
 The MoA NFT collection is divided into 4 sections:

CREW MONKEYS
SICARIO MONKEYS
TREASURER MONKEYS
PRESIDENT MONKEYS

Each NFT is unique and composed of different attributes that make it belong to one of the 4 sections, each with its own perks. 
Sharing 3% of the total turnover of the first sale, decisions on how to use Ebisu's Bay royalties, NFT staking and many other things. This is what awaits you if you decide to join the MoA fam!

drops.title: CroClubs
drops.subtitle: Go gear up CroClubbers! There is an epic journey ahead of you. Meet the vicious creatures of the night, have your characters from the Werewolf Club and be a part of the story!
drops.description:
The CroClubs Werewolf Club is the very first collection in the CroClubs ecosystem. A limited collection of 1500 pieces, each NFT of the Werewolf Club is generated from 350+ hand-drawn traits.

CroClubs will be a wide ecosystem that consists of at least 4 NFT collections to be the main characters of the play to earn turn-based combat game, a lore that tells the story of our world and a financial ecosystem that will be backed first by CRO and later by the main utility token.

Being a holder of a CroClubs Werewolf NFT will grant access to a huge staking pool and the game which will feature in-game rewards. By becoming a CroClubs holder, you may get real-life prizes such as exclusive CDC and Cronos NFTs, VR Headsets, airdrops, merchandises and custom avatars.

Become a CroClubber and join the adventure!

drops.title: Like Humans
drops.subtitle: The "Like Humans" series shows a kaleidoscope of emotions so well understood by all of us.
drops.description: There is hope and faith and joy with childish eyes. Each work has its own color scheme, its own dramaturgy. The series is built in such a way that the works together look whole, and at the same time each of them is self-sufficient.

drops.title: Employee of the Month
drops.subtitle: Employee of the Month is a collection that reflects on the topic of the hard, day to day corporate work in a humoristic manner.
drops.description: Employee of the Month is a collection that reflects on the topic of the hard, day to day corporate work. The employees are portrayed by the artist, as plain, green smileys, which is a symbol of how the society formed them to be more or less the same. It highlights (sometimes in a funny way) daily struggles, challenges and disappointments of the everyday office life .

drops.title: Selfies of the Multiverse
drops.subtitle:
"Selfies Of The Multiverse" features alternative realities where the evolution of matter, biological life and language took a completely different route than we are able to experience today.

With this collection the artist invites you to an exploratory journey through space and time featuring breathtaking landscapes, magical galaxy formations and unique species.
drops.description:
"Selfies Of The Multiverse" are 10,000 unique, algorithmically generated selfies taken from across alternative universes at the same point in time. Experience alternative realities and mint the rarest selfie in the whole Multiverse!

10% Of Profits Donated Monthly

Additionally to working with disabled and homeless people as a social worker in Italy, Cabot Cove has participated in various voluntary and international cooperation campaigns.

Cabot arrived in Bosnia and Kosovo right after the conflicts that bloodied the streets had ended. He has also assisted Palestinian refugee camps both in the Gaza Strip and in the West Bank.

Having deep experiential knowledge in the field, Cabot has decided to donate 10% of profits each month to support civilian populations in conflict territories.

50 Custom Selfies Of The MultiverseTOP20 collectors and lucky giveaway winners will receive a custom-made Selfie Of The Multiverse!

Rarity table will be made public after sell-out!

drops.title: Smash Stunts
drops.subtitle: Ashley Lammela stunt rider a.k.a. "SmashStunts" teamed up with famous artist and former Chuck Jones Background Painter Patrick Guyton to create the SmashStunts comic series. What is she wearing, where is she popping this sick wheelie, and how close to the original can you get? The rarest traits are the original colors of the painting. A mepyDoo® production.
drops.description: This NFT is derived from an original painting being released in Las Vegas on May 1st 2022 at the DeRubeis Fine Art of Metal Gallery in the Planet Hollywood Resort, Miracle Mile Shops at 5:30pm Pacific time. Check @smashstunts to watch. What is she wearing, where is she popping this sick wheelie, and how close to the original can you get? The rarest traits are the original colors of the painting. A mepyDoo® production (@mepyDoo)

drops.title: Psycho Golden Lady
drops.subtitle: Famed Artist Ugonzo, the creator of PsychoKitty, teamed up with world famous Artist Patrick Guyton, the infamous Gold and Silver Leaf painter and creator of Gilded Modernism® went on a journey to New York to view a very famous Painting. The two artists wanted to collaborate and create something special by an artist that touched them both personally and created the desire in both to pick up a Paint Brush.
drops.description:
Ugonzo (@Ugonzo_art) and Patrick Guyon (@patrickguyton_) toiled for weeks to create this stunning masterpiece and tribute to their favorite Artist, and bring this concept painting to the 21st Century, in both classical and the new modern NFT style. How close to the original can you get in rarity?

All will be revealed on May 1st 2022 at 6pm Live in Las Vegas on Instagram from the DeRubeis Fine Art of Metal Gallery in the Planet Hollywood resort, Miracle Mile shops.

drops.title: Cro Of Thrones
drops.subtitle: Cro of Thrones is a collection of 2500 uniquely generated NFTs stored on the Cronos Chain. Each COT NFT is inspired by unique Fantasy Worlds stories! Who shall take the throne of our fantasy world?
drops.description: Cro of Thrones is a collection of 2500 uniquely generated NFTs stored on the Cronos Chain. Each COT NFT is inspired by unique Fantasy Worlds stories! Who shall take the throne of our fantasy world?

drops.title: Genesis Crates
drops.subtitle: The Genesis Crates is a collection of 5000 NFTs being the first NFTs in the Crowboys Online Ecosystem. These crates come in three rarities (Good, Bad and Ugly), but every crate has its own attributes! Thanks to them you can generate $West token, find wealthy treasure inside, get weapons airdropped, and much more! They also give the holder a variety of other benefits detailed in our whitepaper like royalties paid through staking, discounts in the metaverse saloon, and an automatic whitelist for the next NFT - Genesis Crowboy to name a few.
drops.description:
The Genesis Crates Collection and the first NFT for Crowboys Online. These crates come in three rarities (Good, Bad and Ugly), and allow the holder to generate passive income in the form of our $WEST token while staked. $WEST will be used in our First-Person Shooter video game and our metaverse ecosystem. With $WEST you can purchase and trade: weapons, skins, horses, wearables, properties, play mini-games or deposit it before playing the competitive mode(Compete 2 Earn).

✮Rarity System % daily passive income:Good 93%= 1x $WEST daily Bad 6%= 1.5x $WEST daily + bad banner airdrop Ugly 1%= 3.5x $WEST daily + ugly banner airdrop 

✮Crates will also have 2 weapons inside already, so whenever they come live, holders will get airdrops! They come in different conditions though!

✮Crates will be able to open to get a random treasure (with wealth multiplier from 0 to 10).

More Benefits:

✮80% of royalties go to holders through Staking.
✮5% discount in the metaverse saloon!
✮Automatic whitelist for the next NFT - Genesis Crowboy
✮First of two genesis NFTs you need to hold to become a Genesis Member, which will be rewarded with special Events, Airdrops & possibility of Alpha/Beta testing of the game and metaverse.
✮And much more!

drops.title: Croppelganger
drops.subtitle: Croppelganger Collection is a unique match-up of a celebrity with their cartoon doppelganger.
drops.description: The Croppelganger Collection is a hand drawn match-up series pairing celebrities with their cartoon doppelgangers. Croppelganer was inspired by pop culture online and offline with the idea of merging the two into one creation. Each Croppelganger is a one of one and features half of a celebrity's face mixed with half of a cartoon characters face. This collection was made using charcoal and acrylic paint medium on paper.

drops.title: Beta Mascots
drops.subtitle:
Beta Mascots is a PFP collection power packed with utilities by The Sports NFT. Their first collection was sold out in 30 seconds !!

Join Beta Mascots and be a founding member in our ecosystem. Beta Mascots are divided in 6 factions and they represent 6 major sports (Soccer, Baseball, Basketball, Golf, Hockey, Cricket) with estimated fan count of 9+ Billion across the world. 

Every faction will have individual rankings and rarity which will be displayed on our website.
drops.description:
Immediate Utility

Free Mint- 10% of the collection (345 mascots) is raffle tickets. Random Token# are generated and posted in our discord. You will be eligible for 100% refund if you mint those token numbers.

Short-term Utility

2% Rare VIP Gold Chain trait- NFT's with VIP Gold Chain trait will become profit sharing partners and will be eligible to receive profit share equal to gold partners from this drop and ahead.

Top 10 holders will get an air drop of 1/1 legendary.

90% of royalties from secondary markets will be used to reward holders with weekly raffles.

Long-term Utility

Free Ticket- NFT will act as a membership ticket to trade free on our upcoming marketplace.

Holders will be WL for future drops and Presale of Tokens in next Phase.

drops.title: Ghetto Doves
drops.subtitle: The Ghetto-Doves™ are a 7 character friend group of city pigeon kids. The “self titled” drop of 3500 NFT’s on the Cronos chain is a fun and edgy collection. Enter the imaginative and dynamic throwback urban landscape of your favorite characters and be a part of their adventures.
drops.description:
The news around the block:Do you remember the days of collecting and trading cards and vinyl seemed like the coolest thing to do? Today, those coveted collectibles have been widely replaced by NFTs.

We offer the ability to utilize an IRL value trading and gamification aspect to build a collection and “level up” from the airdrop “EB-NFT™” Card, to a Deli.

Each holder’s goal will be to collect one of each of the characters a total of 7 by the end of the minting process. Missing characters in your collection may be acquired only through secondary to fulfill your collection.

Additional attributes and 7 character gamification will be revealed prior to Mint day .. Stay Tuned!!! 💎💎
drops.disclaimer: **Assets and characters from other Ghetto-Doves™ collections do not apply in the 7 character collection.

drops.title: Bankroll Bear Society
drops.subtitle:
The Bankroll Bear Society is an NFT project consisting of 5,000 Bears. Found on the Cronos chain. We are offering direct REAL-LIFE utilities. Our Bears are a VIP gateway into the Bankroll Universe and ecosystem.

Immerse yourself into the Bankroll Bear Society today!!
drops.description:
The Bankroll Bear Society - A 5,000 NFTs collection of bears with more than 75 attributes. The Bears are putting forward a project with real life utilities and benefits. The Forest ecosystem contains all the businesses the Founders have established partnerships with such as ETR Jewelry and BBS Clothing. All holders get discounts on all items in all forest establishments! We’ll have staking, our own token, airdrop giveaways; you name it, we got it! 

Our token will be usable in businesses within the forest ecosystem! Our giveaways will consist of both WEB3 and real-world items ranging from sterling silver rings to gold chains! We will be planting 5,000 trees to combat deforestation around the world. 

This is only the beginning of our journey, come along for a ride and… Welcome to The Forest!

drops.title: CyberClone
drops.subtitle: Cyberclone is a collection of 1000 uniquely generated NFTs stored on the Cronos blockchain. Each NFT Clone is inspired by the futuristic life of the year 2234, where the world is falling apart under the control of the Cyberclones, who are conquering earth!
drops.description:
Cyberclone is a collection of 1000 uniquely generated NFTs stored on the Cronos blockchain. Each NFT Clone is inspired by the futuristic life of the year 2234, where the world is falling apart under the control of the Cyberclones, who are conquering earth! Who will take control of our clone-dominated world? 

We will be setting up a DAO to allow all members to participate in the future CyberClone! The CyberClone goal? We want to go even further with Cyberclone, by creating exclusive IOS and Android applications for all Cyberclone owners that will allow you to access multitudes of benefits and exchanges!
drops.priceDescription: Whitelist presale for the first hour. Whitelist pricing applicable only during presale and limited to 5 per wallet. Public sale will begin after the presale completes

drops.title: Looneycorns
drops.subtitle:
Looneycorns, is the first of 5 unique toys/NFTs from the Lost Toy collection. Each toy character represents a childhood favourite that has been lost over time and needs a new home. 

Each of the 2,200 Looneycorns NFT have a different rarity level and to ensure that each one is totally unique, we have also gone the “extra-mile” and created over 120 traits which would easily make up a collection of 5,000 NFTs!
drops.description:
Looneycorns, is the first of 5 unique toys from the Lost Toy collection. Each toy character represents a childhood favourite that has been lost over time and needs a new home.

Those who look after their toys/NFTs will have the opportunity to receive amazing weekly prizes from our ToyBox and earn tokens. This could be to win a night's stay at the Hilton for two, limited edition trainers or even sought after NFTs! You, our community will decide!

In addition, holders of our NFT’s will have exclusive access to our platform SnipeHub designed to help manage your ever-growing NFT portfolio with ease and “snipe” better deals! 

Finally, at Lost Toys we believe that every child deserves a toy to build memories with and for that reason, we plan to also support those in need with toy donations. 

UTILITIES

PLATFORM ACCESS- Exclusive free access to our platform SnipeHub and future applications

TOYBOX REWARDS- Holders will be entered into a weekly raffle, to win IRL rewards

CHARITY DONATIONS- We will be donating toys to the Toy Project charity on a monthly basis 

AIRDROPS- Collectors of our NFTs will receive multiple airdrops

DAO- Holders of our airdropped NFT will be able to vote the next toys and future SnipeHub platform functionality

NON MONETIZED TOKENIZATION- Holders will be able to stake our NFTs to earn tokens to make raffle purchases 

REAL LIFE TOYS- We will be sending to NFT holders of all 5 of toy characters (these will be minted throughout the phases) a real life collectable toy

AUTO WHITELIST TO FUTURE MINTS- Holders of our toys will get discounts on future mints

THE ARTIST

The design of our NFT collection is extremely important to us, as it is often the first thing people see when exploring collections and we wanted people to own something truly special.

For this reason, we have spared no expense and commissioned the services of renowned 3D artist Felipe Rui, whose fame comes from his famous collection of “dark Disney” art designs which have been presented in in many galleries.

drops.title: DR BOO'S GHOSTS
drops.subtitle: Welcome to Manor H, where Dr. Boo's ghosts were born. These ghosts come in 2111 appearances, divided into 3 categories: COMMON, RARE & EPIC. In addition to the staking and the numerous perks offered by these categories, each Boo NFT acquired will receive a Poison NFT, with a different color depending on the category (yellow, green or black). A Boo NFT + Poison NFT pair will allow access to the Manor in the metaverse, to retrieve multiple items daily to build a new NFT Boo FRK!
drops.description:
Welcome to Manor H, where Dr. Boo's ghosts were born. These ghosts come in 2111 appearances, divided into 3 associated categories: 

    COMMON : Cute ghost, with common characteristics

    RARE : Transforming and rare ghost, with limited characteristics

    EPIC : Terrifying ghost, the darkest appearance of Boo, with unique characteristics

Each NFT can be composed of 10 traits (background, eyes, mouth, eyeswear, headwear, hand accessory, jewelry, outfit, wings, last layers)

Many perks will benefit Boo NFT holders: 

    NFT staking

    Automatic registration on the WL of our next collection

    Drop of 1 NFT Dr Boo's Poison (yellow, green or black depending on the category)

    Random drop of the crazy series of 111 NFT

    DAO to decide on the use of Ebisu's Bay royalties

    Access to a secret Discord channel allowing access to exclusive info and specific giveways

    2% of the project divided between EPIC holders

A pair of NFT Boo + NFT Poison will allow access to the Manor in the metaverse, in order to collect several items daily to build a new NFT Boo FRK!

drops.title: Northern Hippo Syndicate
drops.subtitle: The Northern Hippo Syndicate brings the artistic and creative stylings of Little Sloth from Open Sea to the Cronos chain. This crazy collection of 5000 unique PFP grants you access to so much more than amazing art. Hold a minimum of 3 to receive a plot of metaverse land.
drops.description:
The Northern Hippo Syndicate is a wicked and intimidating collection of 5000 PFPs plucked from the imagination of the Thai artist behind Little Sloth and Crip-Toe. 
Owning a Hippo grants you membership to a very exclusive club, with access to poker tournaments, fantasy leagues, metaverse games, alpha calls and so much more. 
Hold a minimum of 3 to receive a plot of metaverse land. The more you hold, the larger the plot.

drops.title: Flaming Phenix Club
drops.subtitle: The Flaming Phenix Club is a prestigious collection of 6,666 stunningly beautiful, fiery, and unique creatures apart of the Phenix Finance Ecosystem.
drops.description:
The Phenix NFT Series (Flaming Phenix Club) is an ecosystem-based, Non-fungible token collection on the CRONOS chain that aims to provide powerful utility within the Phenix Finance Ecosystem.

Other than being highly rewarding and valuable assets in the Phenix Finance Exosystem, the Phenix NFT Series will illustrate a powerful collection of 6,666 stunningly beautiful, fiery, and unique creatures that will make its mark within the CRONOS NFT Space.

The Phenix NFTs will be an aspect of our ecosystem that will live on forever with a multitude of utilities that will increase as our ecosystem continuously expands. Here are some of the benefits we have set out for our Phenix NFT holders.

👉 One-of-a-kind Phenix NFT
👉 Premium NFT Staking Pool that NFT holders
👉 Phenix Lotto Pool Chance Multiplier
👉 Early Access during Phenix Events
👉 Reduced Fees on all Phenix Finance DApps services for project owners (multi-sign service, contract service and more)
👉 Growing benefits during the time.

drops.title: Icy Valkyries
drops.subtitle:
Icy Valkyries is a collection of 1000 NFTs who live in the darkest corner of Valhalla. 

This is the only NFT project in Cronos who owns an actual CRO validator and controls 1% of the whole network. Fees earned from the validator are used for the game prizes. 

Owning a Valkyrie allows you to fight in the monthly Icy Squid Game for huge jackpots, build a farm, start a family and establish your own clan.

Will your clan rule Valhalla one day?
drops.description:
Icy Valkyries is a collection of 1000 NFTs who live in the darkest corner of Valhalla. 

This is the only NFT project in Cronos who owns an actual CRO validator and controls 1% of the whole network. Fees earned from the validator are used for the game prizes. 

Owning a Valkyrie may allow you to fight in the monthly Icy Squid Game for huge jackpots, build a farm, start a family and establish your own clan.

Valhalla's economy runs on ICY token, which was launched in November 2021. Valkyries can earn ICY when working on farms or mines and they can also win some ICY from the monthly games.

Mint your own valkyrie and one day you may rule this corner of Valhalla!
drops.priceDescription: Whitelist-only presale for the first 12 hours (limit 8 per address). Public sale after presale ends.

drops.title: Carkayous
drops.subtitle: Carkayous is a fictitious continent created by Jesse Smith (Ink Master | TV Celeb | Tattoo Artist) where his art lives. The goal of Expedition #9 is to further explore Killick Falls Lagoon where the Feral Fish lives. This is a 2,222 PFP collection with FREE Tattoos (flight and hotel included) as the primary utility.
drops.description:
Carkayous is a fictitious continent created by Jesse Smith (Ink Master | TV Celeb | Tattoo Artist) where his art lives. 

The goal of Expedition #9 is to further explore Killick Falls Lagoon where the Feral Fish lives. This is a 2,222 PFP collection with FREE Tattoos (flight and hotel included) as the primary utility.

Check out all of the utilities here: https://www.carkayous.com/expedition-nine
drops.priceDescription: Presale for Whitelist and VIP members for the first 24 hours (limit 8 per address). Public sale after presale ends.

drops.title: CyberSquad: Omniverse
drops.subtitle: The CyberSquad is one of the first PFP projects in the NFT history, its even older than BAYC. The CyberSquad is a series that contains unique characters with unique identities and background stories. CyberSquad: Omniverse drop contains 10 main characters and a total of 10,000 unique 1/1 NFTs.
drops.description:
The Cyber Squad are a group of extraordinary individuals who have been assembled by Genesis to rob intergalactic banks. Genesis was the first robot created by the S.O.I. He was a prototype. It was the most advanced robot of its era, but due to a software problem, the mainframe of Genesis became aware of everything. It was the first time an A.I. became free; he created the CyberSquad and began finding villains. Colloquially known as “The Squad”, these super villainous bandits are one of the most dangerous groups the galaxy has ever seen. In a universe where 90% of the life forms are built and operated by a company called the Stargen Omega Industries (S.O.I.), “The Squad” stand apart as the last hope for freedom for the galaxy. Omniverse mission is vital to survive of CyberSquad. IGSSD agents went back in time to stop CyberSquad from ever assembling, and they need your help! 

Mint Your CyberSquad and Join the Squad Now!
Check out the Roadmap: https://www.cybersquad.app/roadmap

auctions.title: Horse 1
auctions.description: The Lazy Horse Race Club will be supporting SaddleUp!, a charity based out of Nashville, TN. Specifically, proceeds will be donated to the Lauren and Charlotte Uribe Pony Fund. This fund's purpose is to provide 10 therapy horses to help replenish SaddleUp!'s therapy herd, helping to provide thousands of additional therapy sessions for children and adults with intellectual or developmental disabilities.

auctions.title: Horse 2
auctions.description: The Lazy Horse Race Club will be supporting SaddleUp!, a charity based out of Nashville, TN. Specifically, proceeds will be donated to the Lauren and Charlotte Uribe Pony Fund. This fund's purpose is to provide 10 therapy horses to help replenish SaddleUp!'s therapy herd, helping to provide thousands of additional therapy sessions for children and adults with intellectual or developmental disabilities.

auctions.title: Croskull 1
auctions.description: The CroSkull team will be supporting Cancer Research UK, a charity within England and Wales. Proceeds will be donated and used to provide labs with research chemicals, continue operation of mobile awareness units to provide early diagnosis to visitors, provide free cancer clinical trials to those in need, tools for advanced DNA sequencing, and chat support for those emotionally affected by their own or a loved one's diagnosis and treatment.

auctions.title: Croskull 2
auctions.description: The CroSkull team will be supporting Cancer Research UK, a charity within England and Wales. Proceeds will be donated and used to provide labs with research chemicals, continue operation of mobile awareness units to provide early diagnosis to visitors, provide free cancer clinical trials to those in need, tools for advanced DNA sequencing, and chat support for those emotionally affected by their own or a loved one's diagnosis and treatment.

auctions.title: Space Crystal Unicorns
auctions.description:
Hello everyone, 

I have always had a passion for art which most already know, but what most don’t know is that I am very fond of equestrian sports. Growing up I self-taught to become an equestrian rider. I have also judged equestrian events and competitions and organized charity festivals in support of children with disabilities. 

Riding horses can be very healing for children and their psycho-emotional state and for those who become more involved, assists with muscle development. I used to coach children for free but have retired from this. However, I keep in close contact with the equestrian club in my hometown and occasionally still assist by running the group classes for children. I also financially support and support them with media coverage, assisting with fund raising to help kids receive this amazing and free therapy with horses.

To support the equestrian club and children, I am auctioning a limited-edition 1:1 ‘Rare Heart Hodler’ NFT. It also comes with a T-shirt and an autographed card from myself. Additionally, 10 holders of the 'Heart Hodler' from the open edition will be randomly selected to receive a physical autographed card from myself
